SEARCH
Module Ordering_System
Package datamodel

Interface ContactsSplitter

public interface ContactsSplitter
Interface ContactsSplitter that manages multiple Customer contacts rendered as JSON-array stored as String value.

A single contact is stored as String value (not as JSON). If more contacts are added, representation switches to JSON-array stored as String value.

Example: 

 [ "eme@gmail.com", "+49 030 515 141345", "fax: 030 234-134651" ]

      i - contact to return

      i-th contact or empty String ""

    • addContact

      Customer addContact(Customer customer, String contact)
      Add contact to Customer object. A single contact is stored as a String value (no JSON). If contacts are added, representation switches to JSON-String.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to add contact
      contact - contact to add
      Returns:
      chainable Customer reference
